abstract.t: Use of the Domain Name System TSIG resource record requires specification of a cryptographic message authentication code. Currently identifiers have been specified only for the HMAC MD5 (Message Digest) and GSS (Generic Security Service) TSIG algorithms. This document standardizes identifiers and implementation requirements for additional HMAC SHA (Secure Hash Algorithm) TSIG algorithms and standardizes how to specify and handle the truncation of HMAC values in TSIG.
